profileAlternative.name: Xiaodi Sun
profileAlternative.headline: Amazon - Data Scientist
profileAlternative.summary:
I am a data science at Amazon. There is nothing more interesting than solving problems based on data.

During my graduated study. I focus on machine learning field and developed strong machine learning background.

When I am not studying, I usually play basketball with my friends. Basketball is my love, and Kobe is my best-loved player. Although he was out, “Second are the number one losers” is always my motto. In addition to basketball, playing video games, watching movies and travel are also my habits.

Besides, I am a communicative person who like building strong relationships with colleagues and partners and love meeting new friends, so please feel free to say hi to me.

Specialities:

Computer Skills: proficient in R / familiar with python and SQL/ beginner of C++, Matlab
Language Skills: Native speaker in Chinese/ fluent in English

I am actively looking for Internships and full-time opportunities as Data Scientist.
Please feel free to contact me if you have any opportunities for me.

Tel: (929)-255-8086
Email: xs2315@columbia.edu
